round seconds from "POSIXct" "POSIXt" classes

Source: R/helpers.R
obs_roundtime.Rd

return rounded seconds from time

Usage

obs_roundtime(x, n = 10)

Arguments

x

time as "POSIXct" "POSIXt"

n

factor

Value

numeric vector

See also

Other helpers: fex(), obs_footname(), obs_format(), obs_freq(), obs_list.dt(), obs_out(), obs_rbind(), obs_read_csvy(), obs_trunc(), obs_write_csvy(), rtorf-deprecated, sr()

Examples

{
x <- Sys.time() + seq(1, 55, 1)
paste0(x,"  ",
       obs_roundtime(x), "  ",
       obs_freq(data.table::second(x),
                seq(0, 55, 10)))
}
#>  [1] "2025-07-17 16:35:11.029524  10  10" "2025-07-17 16:35:12.029524  10  10"
#>  [3] "2025-07-17 16:35:13.029524  10  10" "2025-07-17 16:35:14.029524  10  10"
